_header: A lady bright fair and gay

BLAdd60577.First Lines:
A lady bryȝt fayre and gayMade hir mone and seyd in
                    fay…
BLAdd60577.Last Lines:
…Ye wayte on me with payne of ielowsyWhereon age aperythe
                    properly
